title: Apple iPhone 13 Pro review: Top-class premium camera phone
description: This fall, like the previous years, Apple launched four new handsets-- iPhone 13, 13 mini, 13 Pro and 13 Pro Max.  Depending on the type of model and storage option, the prices range between Rs 69,900 and Rs 1,79,900 in India.
